name: WordPressDownloadPublishingTask
description: Publishes a software package on a WordPress site.
author: Thomas Barnekow
helpMarkDown: Publishes a software package as a new Download Monitor download version, using the REST endpoint created by the Download Monitor REST API WordPress plugin.

inputs.name: localFolder
inputs.label: Local Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local folder containing the software package or other file identified by the File Pattern.

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.label: File Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File name or pattern identifying software package or other file (e.g., '\*.exe', '\*.msi').

inputs.name: remoteFolder
inputs.label: Remote Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remote folder containing the downloadable software package or other file (e.g., 'path/to/folder').

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Download Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Download title as displayed in WordPress (e.g., 'DokuMate for Office').

inputs.name: wordPressUsername
inputs.label: WordPress Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username of WordPress user with at least Editor rights.
